alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Borden; Dawson; Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LEA...NORTHERN ANDREWS...GAINES...NORTHWESTERN BORDEN...NORTHWESTERN MARTIN AND DAWSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/... At 1200 AM CDT/1100 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Welch to near Nadine. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Andrews, Lamesa, Seminole, Seagraves, Monument, Seagraves Airport, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Nadine, Gaines County Airport, Welch, Los Ybanez, Loop, Florey, Punkin Center, Arvana, Hancock, McKenzie Lake, Frankel City, and Paynes Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
